    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean build​(Player player, int level, int xPos, int yPos, int xBuild, int yBuild)
    adds a level on the cell at position (xBuild, yBuild) based on worker current position (xPos, yPos) checks if is possible to builds in (xBuild,yBuild)
    void buildInPos​(Worker worker, int level, int posX, int posY)
    add level to actual level, set level to 4 if parameter is 4
    boolean checkStuckWorker​(int x, int y)
    Given (x,y) a worker position, returns true if the worker is stuck in his position
    boolean createWorker​(Player p, int x, int y)
    Creates a worker in (x,y) cell
    Cell[][] getBoard()  
    int getNumberOfBuild()  
    int getNumberOfMoves()  
    int move​(Player player, int x_start, int y_start, int x_dest, int y_dest)
    Checks if it's possible to move from (x_start, y_start) to (x_dest, y_dest) Checks if the requested position is already occupied by another worker Moves the worker in the position at coordinates (x,y) or sends back an error message Sets the previous occupied cell to "null" (so that the cell is now empty)
    boolean moveWorker​(Worker worker, int posX, int posY)
    sets the previous occupied cell to "null" (so that the cell is now empty) sets the worker into the requested cell
    void removeWorker​(Worker worker)
    Set the cell previously occupied by a worker to empty Calls the removeWorker() method from Player class, to remove the worker from it's Workers list.

    canMoveUp flag is resetted to true

    Reset currentWorker to null every time a player ends his turn

    Checks if (x_dest,y_dest) level is lower than (x_start,y_start) level + 1

  • Method Details

    • getBoard

      public Cell[][] getBoard()

    • setCurrentWorker

      public void setCurrentWorker​(int x, int y)
      Method that sets which worker has done the first move for a player
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the worker
      y - y coordinate of the worker

    • resetCurrentWorker

      public void resetCurrentWorker()
      Reset currentWorker to null every time a player ends his turn

    • move

      public int move​(Player player, int x_start, int y_start, int x_dest, int y_dest)
      Checks if it's possible to move from (x_start, y_start) to (x_dest, y_dest) Checks if the requested position is already occupied by another worker Moves the worker in the position at coordinates (x,y) or sends back an error message Sets the previous occupied cell to "null" (so that the cell is now empty)
      Returns:
      0 if a move is not allowed, 1 if a move is allowed, -1 if a move bring a player to win

    • moveWorker

      public boolean moveWorker​(Worker worker, int posX, int posY)
      sets the previous occupied cell to "null" (so that the cell is now empty) sets the worker into the requested cell

    • build

      public boolean build​(Player player, int level, int xPos, int yPos, int xBuild, int yBuild)
      adds a level on the cell at position (xBuild, yBuild) based on worker current position (xPos, yPos) checks if is possible to builds in (xBuild,yBuild)
      Parameters:
      level - 1 if standard build, 2 if hephaestus build, 4 if atlas build
      Returns:
      true if build is allowed, false if build isn't allowed

    • createWorker

      public boolean createWorker​(Player p, int x, int y)
      Creates a worker in (x,y) cell
      Returns:
      true if there is no worker already in the selected cell, false if there is already a worker inside the cell

    • resetCanMoveUp

      public void resetCanMoveUp()
      canMoveUp flag is resetted to true

    • buildInPos

      public void buildInPos​(Worker worker, int level, int posX, int posY)
      add level to actual level, set level to 4 if parameter is 4
      Parameters:
      level - 1 if standard build, 2 if hephaestus build, 4 if atlas build

    • checkStuckWorker

      public boolean checkStuckWorker​(int x, int y)
      Given (x,y) a worker position, returns true if the worker is stuck in his position
      Returns:
      true if the worker is stuck, else false

    • removeWorker

      public void removeWorker​(Worker worker)
      Set the cell previously occupied by a worker to empty Calls the removeWorker() method from Player class, to remove the worker from it's Workers list.
      Parameters:
      worker - worker to remove

    • tooHighToMove

      public boolean tooHighToMove​(int x_start, int y_start, int x_dest, int y_dest)
      Checks if (x_dest,y_dest) level is lower than (x_start,y_start) level + 1
      Returns:
      true if (x_dest,y_dest) level is lower than (x_start,y_start) level + 1, else false

    • resetState

      public void resetState()
      Resets flags Used when a player ends his turn

    • setCorrectPlayers

      public void setCorrectPlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerlist)
      set player-workers correspondence if a game is loaded
      Parameters:
      playerlist - actual list of player in game

    • setNumberOfMoves

      public void setNumberOfMoves()
      Set numberOfMoves flag to 1

    • getNumberOfMoves

      public int getNumberOfMoves()

    • getNumberOfBuild

      public int getNumberOfBuild()
